attributes.action: Put in place financial help for all Dental Care Professionals during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: In Scotland there has been a financial plan put in place to support the dentists yet the dental therapists, hygienists, nurses and other DCP’s have been forgotten about. It is only fair ALL dental professionals are given help during this horrible time and not just the dentists.
attributes.background: To create the same financial plan the dentists have been given in Scotland so employed / self employed Dental therapists/ hygienists / nurses will not suffer due to hours being cut or having no work in practice.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced schemes to support both employed and self-employed workers. You can find more information on this links:

Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/check-if-you-could-be-covered-by-the-coronavirus-job-retention-scheme

Self-employment Income Support Scheme: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/claim-a-grant-through-the-coronavirus-covid-19-self-employment-income-support-scheme

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
